partyCoffeeCake.name: Party Coffee Cake
partyCoffeeCake.description: This coffee cake is awesome and perfect for parties.

userInstruction.text: Preheat Complete. Put your food inside oven to cook

lambRoast.name: Lamb Roast
lambRoast.description: This roast lamb is awesome and perfect for parties.

userInstruction.text:
While Oven is Preheating, let's prepere your food. 
 Secure roast at 1-inch intervals with heavy string.
Rub surface of roast with rosemary and garlic.
Place roast on the rack of a broiler pan or roasting pan; insert a meat thermometer into thickest portion of roast

actions.value: Your food is ready, you may take it out.
